description.value:
This dirty metal wand is covered in an oily acrid smelling film.

Activate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell}

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wu0xFpewMKRK3HG8]{Grease}, but the grease is caustic. If you cast this spell on an area, any creature that fails their Reflex save and falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, or that begins their turn prone, takes @Damage[1d6[acid]] damage. If you cast this spell on an unattended object, the first creature to pick up the object during the duration takes @Damage[1d6[persistent,acid]] damage. If you cast this spell on an attended object and the holder or wielder fails their Acrobatics or Reflex save, the holder or wielder takes @Damage[1d6[persistent,acid]] damage. If you cast this spell on a worn object, any creature who @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} s or Grabs the wearer takes @Damage[1d6[acid]] damage.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of grease
